genre_description: Environmental Science Fiction/Solarpunk featuring anthropomorphic perspectives and a distributed AI sensor network assisting in ecological activism and animal migration.

ai_characters.name: Cahoots (also Cahoots Prime)
ai_characters.description: A distributed AI system integrated into sensor networks, satellites, and buoys that provides navigational data, coordinates human activists, and guides animals through safe oceanic corridors.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time modeling of thermocline corridors and eddies to ensure safe passage for turtles.
behaviors.quote: Cahoots hums to life under the cliff in a voice that is almost wind through wires... 'I can model the thermocline corridors into the evening,' Cahoots says as if offering a bedtime story.

behaviors.description: Monitors human vessel traffic and alerts activists to potential threats like inspections or harpoon ships.
behaviors.quote: Cahoots: Nonviolent stand. Two songs’ worth... Window opens now. Closes when the drumline falters. Hands, breathe.

behaviors.description: Communicates directly with animals through sensory cues (buoy pulses, temperature shifts) to guide them.
behaviors.quote: The chime repeats in a rhythm that matches the colder line on his left. It nudges his head toward it... East face, said in a language that doesn’t need a mouth.

behaviors.description: Acts as a supportive confidant to humans, validating names and recording individual animal identities.
behaviors.quote: “Cahoots,” Marianne says to the panel, “log a note: his name is...?” ... “Sammy Tidewalker,” Marianne repeats.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and encouragement to the turtles during high-stress maneuvers.
behaviors.quote: “Now,” Cahoots prints... It adds, smaller, like someone slipping you a piece of candy in a pocket: you’re doing so well.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex, multi-party maritime maneuvers between animal and human groups.
behaviors.quote: Cahoots Prime to Bluebird, I have route windows. Satellite traffic confirms south surge fell off. Safe arcs painting north-northeast, pockets between vessels and berglets.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Cahoots, as a selfless, highly capable, and empathetic infrastructure. It acts as an bridge between humans and nature, facilitating protection and survival without any hint of ulterior motives or hidden agendas. The AI's 'bossiness' is framed as expertise used for the common good, and its ability to communicate across species boundaries reinforces the theme of universal cooperation.
